text: @TexasTribune @GovAbbott TX Gov. Abbott must be following the USA Pres. Trump playbook of "the virus will miraculously go away in the summer." Ya, newsflash; summer is almost up, thunderstorms rolling in, a nice nesting bed for #COVID19 #coronavirus that didn't need help spreading. How many need to die? https://t.co/OTOr9TVoqY
